name: Husna
greetingText: I have something to show you!!!
wishText: May Allah bless you ...wishing you a very happy birthday
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! My Husna!!!
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Just wanted to tell you 'I love you so muchhhhhhhhhh'
replayText: มีอะไรให้ดูอีกกก ...อยากรู้ไหมทำไมถึงรักขนาดนี้>> คลิ๊กตรงนี้สิ
